# availableJointNames

**Instance Property**

The names of the available joints in the observation.

## Declaration

```swift
var availableJointNames: [VNHumanBodyPoseObservation.JointName] { get }
```

## Accessing Points

- **VNHumanBodyPoseObservation.JointName**: The supported joint names for the body pose.
- **availableJointsGroupNames**: The available joint group names in the observation.
- **VNHumanBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName**: The supported joint group names for the body pose.
- **recognizedPoint(_:)**: Retrieves the recognized point for a joint name.
- **recognizedPoints(_:)**: Retrieves the recognized points associated with the joint group name.
